ai-ud6.10:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-ud6.10:1.3_0: Then Venerable Ānanda went up to the Buddha,
ai-ud6.10:1.4_0: After the meal, on his return from alms-round, he went to the Buddha, bowed, sat down to one side, and told him what had happened.
ai-ud6.10:2.1_0: “Sir, so long as the Realized Ones, the perfected ones, the fully awakened Buddhas do not arise in the world, the wanderers who follow other paths are honored, respected, esteemed, revered, and venerated. And they receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-ud6.10:2.2_0: But when the Realized Ones do arise in the world, the wanderers who follow other paths are no longer honored in this way.
ai-ud6.10:2.3_0: Now only the Buddha is honored, respected, revered, venerated, and esteemed. And he receives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.”
ai-ud6.10:3.1_0: “That’s so true, Ānanda. So long as the Realized Ones do not arise in the world, the wanderers who follow other paths are honored, respected, esteemed, revered, and venerated. And they receive robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.
ai-ud6.10:3.2_0: But when the Realized Ones do arise in the world, the wanderers who follow other paths are no longer honored in this way.
ai-ud6.10:3.3_0: Now the Realized One is honored, respected, revered, venerated, and esteemed. And he receives robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.”
ai-ud6.10:4.1_0: Then, knowing the significance of this, on that occasion the Buddha expressed this heartfelt sentiment:
ai-ud6.10:5.2_0: as the sun does not rise.
ai-ud6.10:5.3_0: But when the sun has come up,
ai-ud6.10:5.4_0: that light is erased and shines no more.
ai-ud6.10:6.1_0: In the same way the reasoners shine forth
ai-ud6.10:6.2_0: So far as there are a fully awakened Buddhas in the world.
ai-ud6.10:6.3_0: The reasoners are not purified, nor are their disciples.
ai-ud6.10:6.4_0: of wrong view, they’re not released from suffering.”
ai-ud6.10:7.3_0: a group of ninth is finished.
ai-ud6.10:7.5_0: The sixth sub-chapter on blind men is finished.
